page.title: 04Bells Truck Sales
page.content: On our visit to Bells of Ashington on the Barrington Industrial Site we discovered that they sell trucks and wagons as well as use them. This part of the business is Bells Truck Sales. They deal with buyers from all over Northumberland and Tyne and Wear. All the trucks they sell are made by Mercedes Benz of Stuttgart South Germany. Mr Bell has a good working relationship with this firm and has traded with them for 11 years. There is a large range of trucks to choose from as well as minibuses which Mr Bell says are popular with the schools. Spare parts to repair engines and body panels on damaged trucks are found in a large store house. Again the computers are use- ful for keeping a file on parts used.
